title: Darkartists Sciptember Hub 1
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --lgurl: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/secure-facility-dossier-site-120/ontologonew.png");
    --header-title: "SITE-120";
    --header-subtitle: "FIGHTING FIRE WITH FIRE";
    --accentColor: rgb(160, 44, 44);
    --darkColor: rgb(55, 55, 55); 
    --darkerColor: rgb(26, 26, 26);
}

div#extra-div-1 {filter: opacity(.1);}
#header h1 a::before {text-shadow: 2px 0 0 #1a1a1a, -2px 0 0 #1a1a1a, 0 2px 0 #1a1a1a, 0 -2px 0 #1a1a1a, 2px 2px #1a1a1a, -2px -2px 0 #1a1a1a, 2px -2px 0 #1a1a1a, -2px 2px 0 #1a1a1a;}
#header h2::before {text-shadow: 2px 0 0 #1a1a1a, -2px 0 0 #1a1a1a, 0 2px 0 #1a1a1a, 0 -2px 0 #1a1a1a, 2px 2px #1a1a1a, -2px -2px 0 #1a1a1a, 2px -2px 0 #1a1a1a, -2px 2px 0 #1a1a1a;}

#page-title {border-bottom: var(--accentColor) 2px solid;}
.page-rate-widget-box {box-shadow: -3px 0px 0px 0px var(--accentColor), 3px 0px 0px 0px var(--accentColor);}
[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=TheDarkArtist
|center=*]]
When the queen is gambit
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]
